document.full_text: lady gaga will perform on "the late show with david letterman" next week on the day her much-awaited new album "born this way" is released, broadcaster cbs said on monday.
document.title: lady gaga to perform on letterman in album media blitz
lines_and_colors: lady gaga will perform on "the late show with david letterman" next week on the day her much-awaited new album "born this way" is released, broadcaster cbs said on monday.
